headline.main: OUR STAND CLEAR, OFFICIALS INSIST; Germans Seem to Be Denying Even Right of Self-Defense, They Say at Capital

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 1 -- The official statement from Berlin charging that the United States had begun a shooting war against the Reich raised the question here at once whether Hitler had decided to force the issue and bring on all-out war between America and Germany.
abstract: Says Roosevelt has no comment to make on German reply to his Navy Day s
